uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

motd_base64_encoded.description: Set the message of the day banner. Banner will be displayed before login for console, Telnet, SSH, and web sessions. For "no banner motd " passes empty string as argument for  motd_base64_encoded. Maximum length of encoded string that can be passed as argument  is calculated from formula output_size = ((input_size * 4) / 3) + (input_size / 96) + 6 which is approximately 4132.

exec_base64_encoded.description: Set the exec (post-login) banner. Banner will be displayed after login for console, Telnet, SSH, and web sessions. For "no banner exec " passes empty string as argument for  exec_base64_encoded. Maximum length of encoded string that can be passed as argument  is calculated from formula output_size = ((input_size * 4) / 3) + (input_size / 96) + 6 which is approximately 4132.

is_last_login_enabled.description: Enable the last-login banner that displays information about the last successful and unsuccessful login attempts.
